text: is a Japanese film based on the novel Natural Woman by Rieko Matsuura. It was filmed in 1994 and remade with the title Natural Woman 2010 in 2010. ==Cast== ===1994 version=== * Kaori Shimamura as Yoko Murata * Tamaki Ogawa as Hanayo Moronagi * Ryo Ishibashi ===2010 version=== * Ayano as Yoko Murata * Yukari Siomi as Hanayo Moronagi * Ayumi Kinoshita as Keiko Sonoda ==External links== * Natural Woman 2010 Official Site Category:Japanese films Category:Japanese- language films Category:Japanese LGBT-related films Category:Lesbian-related films
title: Natural Woman (film)
